alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 5:01PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Douglas and western Arapahoe Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 501 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Castle Pines, or 18 miles south of Denver, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Denver, Aurora, eastern Centennial, eastern Highlands Ranch, northeastern Castle Rock, Parker, Greenwood Village, Lone Tree, The Pinery, Arapahoe Park, Franktown, Castle Pines and Buckley SFB. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
